message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [Product Name], a product that I know you've been considering.  While I value this product at no less than $800,000, I'm willing to make you a special offer of $950,000. This is a significant opportunity for you to secure a key asset at a competitive price.  I'm confident you'll recognize the value of this offer. Let me know if you'd like to discuss this further.
